meanings.definition: A meeting or conference for discussion of a particular subject.
meanings.sent1: The school organized a symposiums to talk about climate change.
meanings.sent2: The symposiums on renewable energy was very informative.
meanings.sent3: At the symposiums, the debate on pizza toppings got heated.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a symposiums of ideas, each one vying for attention.
meanings.sent5: The symposiums buzzed with energy as experts shared their knowledge.

meanings.definition: A collection of opinions or essays on a particular subject, usually published together.
meanings.sent1: The library had a symposiums of Shakespearean literature.
meanings.sent2: She contributed an essay to the symposiums on modern art.
meanings.sent3: The symposiums of cat memes was a bestseller.
meanings.sent4: His book was a symposiums of wisdom, drawing from various sources.
meanings.sent5: The symposiums showcased diverse perspectives on the topic.
